organic.title: Domestic Violence Shelter Organization Haven Hills
organic.snippet: Haven Hills, a domestic violence shelter organization, offers safety and support to survivors of domestic violence. View our website ✓ Call now: ...

organic.title: Contact us - Haven Hills
organic.snippet: If you need immediate help, please call 911 or our 24/7 Crisis Line at 818-887-6589. If you are looking for a DV support group near you, please call 818-887- ...

organic.title: Services - Haven Hills
organic.snippet: The 45-day crisis shelter provides survivors of domestic violence, as well as their children, with a safe, secure, and confidential space to find stability.

organic.title: Haven Hills in Canoga Park, CA - Domestic Shelters
organic.snippet: 24 hour crisis hotline for victims of intimate partner violence. 30 day crisis shelter, 18 month transitional shelter and DV support groups.
